member.name: IAdviseSinkEx.OnViewStatusChange
member.summary: Notifies the sink that a view status of an object has changed.
member.param: The new view status. Possible values are from the enumeration.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK on success.

member.name: IAdviseSinkEx
member.summary: This interface is derived from to provide extensions for notifying the sink of changes in an object's view status.
